message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product and I think it would be a great fit for you. I'm offering it to you for $110. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $90 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to go down to $100 to meet you halfway.  What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $95?
